common_0285_announcement_01:
Attention, all students. Today marks the
beginning of an important new assignment.
common_0285_announcement_02:
Please assemble in the schoolyard, where I will
explain in more detail.
common_0285_rival_02:
I’ve been waiting FOREVER for this! C’mon,
let’s go out to the schoolyard![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0285_rival_stopper: We gotta go to the schoolyard! Director’s orders![VAR 0114(0004)]
